subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Trades are never easy to evaluate because of the different needs of the teams involved. For every Doyle Alexander, who went 9-0 after being traded from the Braves to the Tigers in 1987, there is the potential for a John Smoltz to go 210-147 over the next 20 seasons for Atlanta. So when looking at trades made this season, it is important to look at them in their entire context.
